name: Cocaine Dealer
description:
Reviews from actual drug dealers:

"Yeah that looks alright man, you got that paper you owe yeah?" - T
"I dunno man I prefer CoD" - G
"-THE NUMBER YOU HAVE DIALLED HAS BEEN DISCONNECTED-" - P


  • Experience the repetition and inconvenience of being a 24/7 cocaine dealer!

  • Scoop powder endlessly onto a scale to be sold for far more it is worth!

  • Send kids out on the street to sell, get arrested, and possibly killed, while you pocket the profits!

  • Manage your fatigue levels as your sleep is once again disturbed by a flurry of drunken phone calls from customers!

  • Buy drugs from the most ruthless people around and sell them to the most desperate!

  • Spend your money on all kinds of meaningless flashy shit!

  • Feel the rush of dumping your product down the toilet while the police try to batter your door down!

  • Lose it all, or keep going until you lose it all!



    Start out small-time, with an ounce of product, a set of scales, and a burner phone.

    Wrap your grams quickly and efficiently, and send your shotters out to sell. Find the balance between quantity and quality to grow your money and your rep.

    Recruit more workers and manage them effectively. Keep an eye on peak selling times and make sure you have product to move on the streets.

    As your operation grows, so will your customer base. Make sure you have the product and the couriers available day and night, because the high rollers won't be happy if you keep them waiting.

    Buy upgrades for your safehouse, invest in security or transport for your crew, or spend it all on clothes, chains, and cars, to boost your profile.
